# Dotfiles

This repository contains all dotfiles.

## Installation

1. Install yadm

```bash
sudo apt install yadm
```
2. Clone this repo 

```bash
yadm clone git@github.com:Ni-g-3l/dotfiles.git
```

3. Sync with current device
```bash
yadm boostrap
yadm pull
```
## Available Configs

* [nvim](https://neovim.io/)
